dataStatic.description: A manor house converted into a gentleman's club. Trophy heads of dragons and beholders line the walls.
A retired Paladin of Lathander, limping from an old dragon wound. The moral compass of the city.

personality.trait: Believes in redemption, even for Zhents.

dataStatic.description: Walls covered in maps of the Stonelands and the Haunted Halls, marked with 'X's where parties died.

hooks.title: The Lost Patrol
hooks.description: Sir Isteval needs a team to recover the bodies of a patrol in the Hullack Forest.
